title: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: When I select SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, the application emits a beeping sound. This behavior seems incorrect and unintended.
OB: In addition, clicking on other buttons in the application also triggers the beeping sound.
EB: Instead of hearing the beeping sound, I expect the ControlExampleText to allow multiple selections without any audible notification.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application 
2. Open the ControlExampleText 
3. Select the SWT.MULTI option 
4. Observe the beeping sound emitted from the application 
5. Click on other buttons in the application and note that the beeping sound occurs again
